nodes.explanation: text marked with the term "sic," indicating errors in the original quote that should be preserved
errors or mistakes indicated by the term "[sic]"
text enclosed in brackets denoting corrections or mistakes
text marked as incorrect or in need of revision, denoted by the abbreviation "sic"
expressions of disbelief or corrections in text
instances of the word "sic" often used to indicate that a quoted text is reproduced as originally written, including any errors
errors or inaccuracies marked with "sic" in the text
text marked with the notation "sic," indicating a perceived error or issue
text enclosed in square brackets with the acronym "sic" denoting a mistake
incorrectly spelled words marked with the abbreviation "sic."
